name: agenttailor
description: Cross-platform AI agent tailoring add-on for ChatGPT and Claude

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,dashboard "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w dashboard"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w dashboard && npm run build -w extension && npm run build -w mcp-server && npm run build -w landing
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules shared/node_modules server/node_modules dashboard/node_modules extension/node_modules mcp-server/node_modules landing/node_modules shared/dist server/dist dashboard/dist extension/dist mcp-server/dist landing/dist
